dfischer.utils

Class FileCacheElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.FileCacheElement

  • public class FileCacheElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Element of FileCache - contains all data about one cached file.
    See Also:
    FileCache

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileCacheElement(FileCacheElement oldElement)
      Create a clone.
      FileCacheElement(java.lang.String fileName)
      Deprecated. 
      since V5.4-K, does not support encrypted files. Read a file from disk and store in memory the file name, the file data and the last modification date of the file.
      FileCacheElement(java.lang.String fileName, byte[] fileData, long lastModified)
      Create a new instance from memory (without reading a disk file).
      FileCacheElement(SymmetricEncryptContext decryptContext, java.lang.String fileName)
      Read a file from disk and store in memory the file name, the file data and the last modification date of the file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getFileData()
      Get the data of the file.
      java.lang.String getFileDataAsString()
      Get the data of the file converted to a string by using the platform's default charset.
      java.lang.String getFileDataAsString(java.lang.String charsetName)
      Get the data of the file converted to a string by using a specified charset.
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Get the file name.
      int getFileSize()
      Get the size of the file.
      long getLastModified()
      Get the last modification date (related to the cached data of the file).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileCacheElement

        public FileCacheElement(SymmetricEncryptContext decryptContext,
                java.lang.String fileName)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Read a file from disk and store in memory the file name, the file data and the last modification date of the file.
        Parameters:
        decryptContext - the context to decrypt the file, or null if the file is not encrypted
        fileName - the file name (relative or absolute path).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        V5.4-K

      • FileCacheElement

        public FileCacheElement(java.lang.String fileName)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. since V5.4-K, does not support encrypted files. Read a file from disk and store in memory the file name, the file data and the last modification date of the file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name (relative or absolute path).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • FileCacheElement

        public FileCacheElement(FileCacheElement oldElement)
        Create a clone.
        Parameters:
        oldElement - the instance to clone.

      • FileCacheElement

        public FileCacheElement(java.lang.String fileName,
                byte[] fileData,
                long lastModified)
        Create a new instance from memory (without reading a disk file).
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name
        fileData - the data of the file
        lastModified - the last modification date of the data (elapsed milliseconds since January 1, 1970 GMT)

        Returns:

      • getFileDataAsString

        public java.lang.String getFileDataAsString(java.lang.String charsetName)
        Get the data of the file converted to a string by using a specified charset.
        Parameters:
        charsetName - the name of a charset
        Returns:
        the data of the file converted to a string

      • getLastModified

        public long getLastModified()
        Get the last modification date (related to the cached data of the file).
        Returns:
        the last modification date of the file in cache (elapsed milliseconds since January 1, 1970 GMT).
